      public java.util.List<Card> getUserCards​(int userId) throws DAOException
      Description copied from interface: FacilityDAO
      Requests list of the user's cards by user's id

      Returns empty list if no user's cards were find

      Specified by:
      getUserCards in interface FacilityDAO
      Parameters:
      userId - value is the identifier of the user whose cards will be requested
      Returns:
      list of the Card objects of the user
      Throws:
      DAOException - if an error occurs during requesting user's cards
